org.jfree.chart Core classes, including JFreeChart and ChartPanel.

Methods in org.jfree.chart that return TextTitle

          Returns the main chart title.
 

Methods in org.jfree.chart with parameters of type TextTitle
 void JFreeChart.setTitle(TextTitle title)
          Sets the main title for the chart and sends a ChartChangeEvent to all registered listeners.
